check_box.name: fixed_time_check
check_box.tool_tip: Once checked, this box causes the local environment to get frozen (fixed) at a given time of the day, that you can adjust with the slider on the right. You cannot un-check this box after checking it, and would have to use the 'Reset' button to do it.
check_box.label: Fixed time

button.name: btn_reset
button.label: Reset
button.tool_tip: Revert to last local environment settings.

button.name: btn_close
button.label: Close
button.tool_tip: Close this floater, keeping the current local environment settings.
